title: Stanislav Sel'skiy
text:
Stanislav Sel'skiy (born 2 September 1991) is a <a href="Russian%20people">Russian</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who generally plays as a <a href="hooker%20%28rugby%20union%29">hooker</a> represents <a href="Russia%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Russia</a> internationally.
Career.
In the <a href="European%20Rugby%20Challenge%20Cup">European Rugby Challenge Cup</a> he has 5 tries in 24 matches for <a href="Yenisey-STM%20Krasnoyarsk">Enisey-STM</a>. Stanislav made his international debut for Russia against Emerging Italy on 8 June 2012.
He featured in a PRL All-Star Game in 2013 and the match was held as part of the celebration of the 90th anniversary of rugby in Russia. He was included in the <a href="2019%20Rugby%20World%20Cup%20squads">Russian squad</a> for the <a href="2019%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">2019 Rugby World Cup</a> which was held in Japan for the first time and also marked his first World Cup appearance. 
He was also part of the national side which participated at the <a href="2020%20Rugby%20Europe%20Championship">2020 Rugby Europe Championship</a> and <a href="2021%20Rugby%20Europe%20Championship">2021 Rugby Europe Championship</a>.
Honours
